bit_order.docs:
Set the bit order - choose one of `msb_first` (default) or `lsb_first`.

*See also: [Generic SPI device component:](https://esphome.io/components/spi.html#id1)*

cs_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The CS pin.

*See also: [Generic SPI device component:](https://esphome.io/components/spi.html#id1)*

data_rate.docs:
Set the data rate of the controller. One of `80MHz`, `40MHz`, `20MHz`, `10MHz`, `5MHz`, `4MHz`, `2MHz`, `1MHz` (default), `200kHz`, `75kHz` or `1kHz`. A numeric value in Hz can alternatively be specified.

*See also: [Generic SPI device component:](https://esphome.io/components/spi.html#id1)*

spi_mode.docs:
Set the controller mode - one of `mode0`, `mode1`, `mode2`, `mode3`. The default is `mode3`. See table below for more information

*See also: [Generic SPI device component:](https://esphome.io/components/spi.html#id1)*
